text: Charlotte's Web is a children's novel by E. B. White. First published in 1952, it was illustrated by Garth Williams and won many awards. Three movies are based on the book: * Charlotte's Web (1973), an animated movie made by Hanna- Barbera productions. * Charlotte's Web 2: Wilbur's Great Adventure (2003), the sequel to the 1973 movie. * Charlotte's Web (2006), a live-action movie based on the book, starring Julia Roberts and Dakota Fanning. Category:1950s books Category:20th-century American novels Category:Newbery Honor books Category:American children's books
title: Charlotte's Web
